name: Hekate's Night
description:
On Samhain, a witch working with Hekate petitions her for help and ends up getting sent back in time to Samhain of last year. The witch has a conversation with her now-deceased dad and tries to figure out her direction in life.

---

Playtime: around 5 minutes
